content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":264582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は蘇った彼に面会し妖怪王の地位を返上を提案したのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I met with the resurrected him and proposed that he relinquish the position of Youkai King."},{"lineNumber":264583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　が、黒部は断った。","translatedEnglishLine":"But Kurobe refused."},{"lineNumber":264584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪王の地位など興味は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"He has no interest in the position of Youkai King."},{"lineNumber":264585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒部は誰かの上に立ちたいのでは無い、石丸殿のように使えるべき主が欲しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe doesn't want to be above anyone; he wants a master he can serve, like Lord Ishimaru."},{"lineNumber":264586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　信頼すべき主を得たあの気持ちを知った今、妖怪の王などの地位に興味はない","translatedEnglishLine":"Now that he knows the feeling of having a trustworthy master, he has no interest in a position like Youkai King."},{"lineNumber":264587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主となる者が現れるまで待ち続けるといい死国の辺境に籠もっている","translatedEnglishLine":"He is secluding himself on the border of the Land of the Dead, saying he will wait until a master appears."},{"lineNumber":264588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほっとけばいいのだが、そうはいかなくなった","translatedEnglishLine":"I could have left him alone, but that was no longer possible."},{"lineNumber":264590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一部の妖怪が黒部の元に走った、元より人間との共存を決めた政宗に反感を持つ妖怪は","translatedEnglishLine":"Some youkai flocked to Kurobe; there were quite a few youkai who resented Masamune, who had already decided to coexist with humans."},{"lineNumber":264591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少なからずいた、またこの事態をより煽動している者がいる（傾国の匂いも少し入れておく）","translatedEnglishLine":"There were not a few, and furthermore, someone was instigating this situation even more (with a hint of 'Kekoku' influence as well)."},{"lineNumber":264592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今や約半数の妖怪が黒部の元に集まっている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, about half of the youkai have gathered under Kurobe."},{"lineNumber":264593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不甲斐ないと政宗・・・私でも黒部でもどちらでもよい、一致団結して魔軍と立ち向かわねば","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune is frustrated... It doesn't matter if it's me or Kurobe, we must unite and stand against the demon army."},{"lineNumber":264594,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ならない時に、妖怪達を二分させてしまったと","translatedEnglishLine":"But at a time when we must not, the youkai have been split into two factions."},{"lineNumber":264595,"originalJapaneseLine":"話は分かったとランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand the situation,\" said Rance."},{"lineNumber":264596,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺が言って黒部とやらを倒して俺が主と認めさせたら解決するのであろう","translatedEnglishLine":"If I say so and defeat this Kurobe, and make him acknowledge me as his master, it should solve the problem."},{"lineNumber":264597,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗、黒部はとんでもなく強い・・ランス殿でも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune: Kurobe is incredibly strong... even Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":264598,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、問題ない。お前も手伝え。集団でたこ殴りだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, no problem. You help too. We'll gang up on him."},{"lineNumber":264599,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、黒部はどこにいるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"So, where is Kurobe?"},{"lineNumber":264600,"originalJapaneseLine":"死国です。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the Land of the Dead."},{"lineNumber":264601,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、では、時間もない事だし、さっそく出発するぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright then, since there's no time to waste, let's depart immediately!"},{"lineNumber":264602,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞出撃","translatedEnglishLine":"> Sortie"},{"lineNumber":264603,"originalJapaneseLine":"死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道、茶屋","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road, teahouse."},{"lineNumber":264604,"originalJapaneseLine":"途中で休憩。","translatedEnglishLine":"Stopped midway to rest."},{"lineNumber":264605,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六と久し振りに話。","translatedEnglishLine":"Spoke with Isoroku after a long time."},{"lineNumber":264606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義は元気ですかと聞かれたり","translatedEnglishLine":"He asked if Rangii is doing well."},{"lineNumber":264607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスには感謝しているなど","translatedEnglishLine":"And that he is grateful to Rance, among other things."},{"lineNumber":264608,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キャラの雰囲気や関係が分かる会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A conversation that reveals the characters' atmosphere and relationships."},{"lineNumber":264609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのまま、ランスはエロに持ち込む・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, Rance smoothly shifts things into something erotic..."},{"lineNumber":264610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フェードアウト","translatedEnglishLine":"Fade out."},{"lineNumber":264611,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264612,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝、部屋から五十六を連れて出てきたランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the morning, Rance came out of the room accompanied by Isoroku."},{"lineNumber":264613,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうの建物から、ちょうど政宗が出てきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"From a building over there, Masamune just came out."},{"lineNumber":264614,"originalJapaneseLine":"お町、ノワール、折女、野菊を連れている。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was accompanied by Omachi, Noir, Orime, and Nogiku."},{"lineNumber":264615,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラブホテルから出た所でばったりあった知り合いみたいなノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"The atmosphere was like acquaintances bumping into each other just outside a love hotel."},{"lineNumber":264616,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは自分が五十六一人に対して、向こうが４人なのがなんか負けた気になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance felt defeated, being alone with Isoroku while they had four people."},{"lineNumber":264617,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと待て、出発は２時間後だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a minute, departure is in two hours."},{"lineNumber":264618,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい、シィル、かなみ、香ちゃん、クルックー、五十六、柚美、こい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Sill, Kanami, Ka-chan, Kurukuu, Isoroku, Yuzumi, come here."},{"lineNumber":264619,"originalJapaneseLine":"連れていく・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm taking you all along..."},{"lineNumber":264620,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":264621,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・","translatedEnglishLine":".."},{"lineNumber":264622,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははははと今度は、６人を連れて部屋から出てきたランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, this time Rance came out of the room accompanied by six people."},{"lineNumber":264623,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗を見て、にやりと笑う。","translatedEnglishLine":"He looked at Masamune and grinned slyly."},{"lineNumber":264624,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが突っ込み・・いや、そんな所、対抗しなくても・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone tried to retort... no, you don't have to compete in such a place..."},{"lineNumber":264625,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここ助長になったり、うまく出来ない時はランスのハーレムネタはカットでもいいです）","translatedEnglishLine":"(If this becomes unnecessarily drawn out or doesn't go well, it's fine to cut Rance's harem jokes here.)"},{"lineNumber":264626,"originalJapaneseLine":"死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road."},{"lineNumber":264627,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが誰かと会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance converses with someone."},{"lineNumber":264628,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒部の話","translatedEnglishLine":"A story about Kurobe."},{"lineNumber":264629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　初代妖怪王黒部は、藤原石丸に付き従い数万の妖怪部隊を率いて","translatedEnglishLine":"The first Youkai King, Kurobe, followed Fujiwara Ishimaru and led tens of thousands of youkai troops."},{"lineNumber":264630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＪＡＰＡＮから大陸に攻め込んだ事がある","translatedEnglishLine":"He once invaded the continent from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":264631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれ、妖怪ってＪＡＰＡＮから出られないのではないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, aren't youkai unable to leave JAPAN?"},{"lineNumber":264632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうです。ですから、私達はこの戦いもＪＡＰＡＮで留守番している","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right. So we also stay behind in JAPAN during this battle."},{"lineNumber":264633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪は、このＪＡＰＡＮの地下にいる聖獣オロチの影響で存在している","translatedEnglishLine":"Youkai exist because of the influence of the sacred beast Orochi underground in JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":264634,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オロチから離れては存在が出来ない、ゆえにＪＡＰＡＮから離れられない","translatedEnglishLine":"They cannot exist away from Orochi, thus they cannot leave JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":264635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、黒部は特別な妖怪。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Kurobe is a special youkai."},{"lineNumber":264636,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれはオロチの牙から産まれた存在、存在そのものがオロチの一部である","translatedEnglishLine":"He was born from Orochi's fang; his very existence is part of Orochi."},{"lineNumber":264637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゆえに黒部と共に多数の妖怪が大陸に渡る事が出来た。","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, many youkai were able to cross to the continent alongside Kurobe."},{"lineNumber":264638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なるほど・・黒部を従えたら、お前達妖怪軍団も大陸の連れていって","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... If we take Kurobe as our master, you youkai troops can also be taken to the continent."},{"lineNumber":264639,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こき使う事が出来るという訳だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Meaning, we could employ you to work hard for us there."},{"lineNumber":264640,"originalJapaneseLine":"この大門を越えると死国です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Beyond this great gate lies the Land of the Dead."},{"lineNumber":264641,"originalJapaneseLine":"死国に入りました。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have entered the Land of the Dead."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は蘇った彼に面会し妖怪王の地位を返上を提案したのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I met with the resurrected him and proposed that he relinquish the position of Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、黒部は断った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Kurobe refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王の地位など興味は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has no interest in the position of Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部は誰かの上に立ちたいのでは無い、石丸殿のように使えるべき主が欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe doesn't want to be above anyone; he wants a master he can serve, like Lord Ishimaru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信頼すべき主を得たあの気持ちを知った今、妖怪の王などの地位に興味はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that he knows the feeling of having a trustworthy master, he has no interest in a position like Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主となる者が現れるまで待ち続けるといい死国の辺境に籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is secluding himself on the border of the Land of the Dead, saying he will wait until a master appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとけばいいのだが、そうはいかなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could have left him alone, but that was no longer possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一部の妖怪が黒部の元に走った、元より人間との共存を決めた政宗に反感を持つ妖怪は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some youkai flocked to Kurobe; there were quite a few youkai who resented Masamune, who had already decided to coexist with humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なからずいた、またこの事態をより煽動している者がいる（傾国の匂いも少し入れておく）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were not a few, and furthermore, someone was instigating this situation even more (with a hint of 'Kekoku' influence as well).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や約半数の妖怪が黒部の元に集まっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, about half of the youkai have gathered under Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不甲斐ないと政宗・・・私でも黒部でもどちらでもよい、一致団結して魔軍と立ち向かわねば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune is frustrated... It doesn't matter if it's me or Kurobe, we must unite and stand against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならない時に、妖怪達を二分させてしまったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But at a time when we must not, the youkai have been split into two factions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話は分かったとランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand the situation," said Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が言って黒部とやらを倒して俺が主と認めさせたら解決するのであろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I say so and defeat this Kurobe, and make him acknowledge me as his master, it should solve the problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、黒部はとんでもなく強い・・ランス殿でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune: Kurobe is incredibly strong... even Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、問題ない。お前も手伝え。集団でたこ殴りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, no problem. You help too. We'll gang up on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、黒部はどこにいるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is Kurobe?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the Land of the Dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、時間もない事だし、さっそく出発するぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then, since there's no time to waste, let's depart immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Sortie

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道、茶屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road, teahouse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中で休憩。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stopped midway to rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六と久し振りに話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Spoke with Isoroku after a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義は元気ですかと聞かれたり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked if Rangii is doing well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスには感謝しているなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that he is grateful to Rance, among other things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラの雰囲気や関係が分かる会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation that reveals the characters' atmosphere and relationships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ランスはエロに持ち込む・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Rance smoothly shifts things into something erotic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fade out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、部屋から五十六を連れて出てきたランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the morning, Rance came out of the room accompanied by Isoroku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうの建物から、ちょうど政宗が出てきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a building over there, Masamune just came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町、ノワール、折女、野菊を連れている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was accompanied by Omachi, Noir, Orime, and Nogiku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラブホテルから出た所でばったりあった知り合いみたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere was like acquaintances bumping into each other just outside a love hotel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは自分が五十六一人に対して、向こうが４人なのがなんか負けた気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance felt defeated, being alone with Isoroku while they had four people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待て、出発は２時間後だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, departure is in two hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、シィル、かなみ、香ちゃん、クルックー、五十六、柚美、こい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Sill, Kanami, Ka-chan, Kurukuu, Isoroku, Yuzumi, come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていく・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm taking you all along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと今度は、６人を連れて部屋から出てきたランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, this time Rance came out of the room accompanied by six people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗を見て、にやりと笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked at Masamune and grinned slyly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが突っ込み・・いや、そんな所、対抗しなくても・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tried to retort... no, you don't have to compete in such a place...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここ助長になったり、うまく出来ない時はランスのハーレムネタはカットでもいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If this becomes unnecessarily drawn out or doesn't go well, it's fine to cut Rance's harem jokes here.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが誰かと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance converses with someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A story about Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王黒部は、藤原石丸に付き従い数万の妖怪部隊を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first Youkai King, Kurobe, followed Fujiwara Ishimaru and led tens of thousands of youkai troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから大陸に攻め込んだ事がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He once invaded the continent from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、妖怪ってＪＡＰＡＮから出られないのではないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, aren't youkai unable to leave JAPAN?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうです。ですから、私達はこの戦いもＪＡＰＡＮで留守番している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. So we also stay behind in JAPAN during this battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪は、このＪＡＰＡＮの地下にいる聖獣オロチの影響で存在している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Youkai exist because of the influence of the sacred beast Orochi underground in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オロチから離れては存在が出来ない、ゆえにＪＡＰＡＮから離れられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They cannot exist away from Orochi, thus they cannot leave JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部は特別な妖怪。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Kurobe is a special youkai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはオロチの牙から産まれた存在、存在そのものがオロチの一部である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was born from Orochi's fang; his very existence is part of Orochi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆえに黒部と共に多数の妖怪が大陸に渡る事が出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, many youkai were able to cross to the continent alongside Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど・・黒部を従えたら、お前達妖怪軍団も大陸の連れていって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... If we take Kurobe as our master, you youkai troops can also be taken to the continent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こき使う事が出来るという訳だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meaning, we could employ you to work hard for us there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この大門を越えると死国です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beyond this great gate lies the Land of the Dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に入りました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have entered the Land of the Dead.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は蘇った彼に面会し妖怪王の地位を返上を提案したのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I met with the resurrected him and proposed that he relinquish the position of Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、黒部は断った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Kurobe refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王の地位など興味は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has no interest in the position of Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部は誰かの上に立ちたいのでは無い、石丸殿のように使えるべき主が欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe doesn't want to be above anyone; he wants a master he can serve, like Lord Ishimaru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信頼すべき主を得たあの気持ちを知った今、妖怪の王などの地位に興味はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that he knows the feeling of having a trustworthy master, he has no interest in a position like Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主となる者が現れるまで待ち続けるといい死国の辺境に籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is secluding himself on the border of the Land of the Dead, saying he will wait until a master appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとけばいいのだが、そうはいかなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could have left him alone, but that was no longer possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一部の妖怪が黒部の元に走った、元より人間との共存を決めた政宗に反感を持つ妖怪は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some youkai flocked to Kurobe; there were quite a few youkai who resented Masamune, who had already decided to coexist with humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なからずいた、またこの事態をより煽動している者がいる（傾国の匂いも少し入れておく）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were not a few, and furthermore, someone was instigating this situation even more (with a hint of 'Kekoku' influence as well).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や約半数の妖怪が黒部の元に集まっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, about half of the youkai have gathered under Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不甲斐ないと政宗・・・私でも黒部でもどちらでもよい、一致団結して魔軍と立ち向かわねば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune is frustrated... It doesn't matter if it's me or Kurobe, we must unite and stand against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならない時に、妖怪達を二分させてしまったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But at a time when we must not, the youkai have been split into two factions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話は分かったとランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand the situation," said Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が言って黒部とやらを倒して俺が主と認めさせたら解決するのであろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I say so and defeat this Kurobe, and make him acknowledge me as his master, it should solve the problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、黒部はとんでもなく強い・・ランス殿でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune: Kurobe is incredibly strong... even Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、問題ない。お前も手伝え。集団でたこ殴りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, no problem. You help too. We'll gang up on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、黒部はどこにいるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is Kurobe?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the Land of the Dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、時間もない事だし、さっそく出発するぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then, since there's no time to waste, let's depart immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Sortie

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道、茶屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road, teahouse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中で休憩。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stopped midway to rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六と久し振りに話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Spoke with Isoroku after a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義は元気ですかと聞かれたり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked if Rangii is doing well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスには感謝しているなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that he is grateful to Rance, among other things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラの雰囲気や関係が分かる会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation that reveals the characters' atmosphere and relationships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ランスはエロに持ち込む・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Rance smoothly shifts things into something erotic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fade out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、部屋から五十六を連れて出てきたランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the morning, Rance came out of the room accompanied by Isoroku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうの建物から、ちょうど政宗が出てきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a building over there, Masamune just came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町、ノワール、折女、野菊を連れている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was accompanied by Omachi, Noir, Orime, and Nogiku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラブホテルから出た所でばったりあった知り合いみたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere was like acquaintances bumping into each other just outside a love hotel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは自分が五十六一人に対して、向こうが４人なのがなんか負けた気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance felt defeated, being alone with Isoroku while they had four people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待て、出発は２時間後だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, departure is in two hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、シィル、かなみ、香ちゃん、クルックー、五十六、柚美、こい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Sill, Kanami, Ka-chan, Kurukuu, Isoroku, Yuzumi, come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていく・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm taking you all along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと今度は、６人を連れて部屋から出てきたランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, this time Rance came out of the room accompanied by six people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗を見て、にやりと笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked at Masamune and grinned slyly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが突っ込み・・いや、そんな所、対抗しなくても・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tried to retort... no, you don't have to compete in such a place...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここ助長になったり、うまく出来ない時はランスのハーレムネタはカットでもいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If this becomes unnecessarily drawn out or doesn't go well, it's fine to cut Rance's harem jokes here.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に向かう道中、ＪＡＰＡＮ街道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the Land of the Dead, Japan Road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが誰かと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance converses with someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A story about Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王黒部は、藤原石丸に付き従い数万の妖怪部隊を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first Youkai King, Kurobe, followed Fujiwara Ishimaru and led tens of thousands of youkai troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから大陸に攻め込んだ事がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He once invaded the continent from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、妖怪ってＪＡＰＡＮから出られないのではないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, aren't youkai unable to leave JAPAN?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうです。ですから、私達はこの戦いもＪＡＰＡＮで留守番している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. So we also stay behind in JAPAN during this battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪は、このＪＡＰＡＮの地下にいる聖獣オロチの影響で存在している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Youkai exist because of the influence of the sacred beast Orochi underground in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オロチから離れては存在が出来ない、ゆえにＪＡＰＡＮから離れられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They cannot exist away from Orochi, thus they cannot leave JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部は特別な妖怪。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Kurobe is a special youkai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはオロチの牙から産まれた存在、存在そのものがオロチの一部である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was born from Orochi's fang; his very existence is part of Orochi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆえに黒部と共に多数の妖怪が大陸に渡る事が出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, many youkai were able to cross to the continent alongside Kurobe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど・・黒部を従えたら、お前達妖怪軍団も大陸の連れていって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... If we take Kurobe as our master, you youkai troops can also be taken to the continent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こき使う事が出来るという訳だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meaning, we could employ you to work hard for us there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この大門を越えると死国です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beyond this great gate lies the Land of the Dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死国に入りました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have entered the Land of the Dead.
